description: WHOA! Tex Ryder just got busted by Mason Wyler! Tex thought it'd be o.k. to jerk off to some porn in Mason's room before Mason arrived back home. How about instead of masturbating to porn, you take Mason's hard cock in the ass??   Enjoy!
title: Mason Wyler & Tex
